item.description:
Join us for dimsum & bowling after to burn off some of the calories. If you are a new member, we hope you will come out to share good food and conversation. We will head to Boston Bowl after dimsum.

RSVP - this RSVP is for both dimsum & bowling. Please indicate if you are only going for dimsum or bowling.

Transportation - if you need we can arrange for some rides from Quincy Center T stop. Please note that in your RSVP.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum & Bowling
